title: Developing Instructional Design Strategies for Improving Online Education Quality

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Analysis of online education quality elements and derivation of improvement strategies in VR simulation-based language education environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain six core elements of online education quality evaluation standards (based on Quality Matters rubric)
Learners can write a report analyzing learner support strategies and the importance of technological environments through surveys
Learners can apply three or more quality improvement strategies to VR-based language education scenarios
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
